header.title: start

comref.comsummary: OTP start script example for Unix

description.p: This describes the start script that is an example script on how to startup the Erlang system in embedded mode on Unix.
You can read more about the use in the Embedded System User's Guide.

func.name: start [ data_file ]
func.fsummary: This is an example script on how to startup the Erlang system in embedded mode on Unix.

desc.p: In the example there is one argument

taglist.item: Optional, specifies what start_erl.data file to use.

desc.p: There is also an environment variable RELDIR that can be set prior to calling this example that set the directory where to find the release files.
